title: 159: Are Farts Actually Funny? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 159
description:
R&L discuss the history of farts in the entertainment industry, their families' attitudes towards flatulence, and why context matters when it comes to a comedic air biscuit on this week's episode of ear biscuits.
